name: Give This Game a Name
description:
After the experiments you find yourself the only PERSON alive in the laboratory, your objective is to get all the valves and escape by the door, but you are not alone

He killed everyone else, he can hear your steps when you run, and he is coming for you

It's not a hard task Dr. Kevmann, don't ruin it.

This game is a prototype or a demo about an horror game, i did it in one day so i could publish it on Halloween, enjoy it!

Special Thanks to:

Eze213qwerty, he made the music

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWnXOB20bCfErwM2d34jAyQ
